parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the target object or position where the given camera should point at. Needs the call of [[camCommit]] to be conducted. To reset the target use [[objNull]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera [[camSetTarget]] target

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] - target location

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> camera [[camSetTarget]] position

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - target location - [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camSetTarget]] [2540,1503,26];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] ([[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0, 100, 10]);
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[camSetRelPos]] [0, 0.5, 1.5];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "back"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 1;
[[player]] [[setRandomLip]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camCreate]], [[camTarget]]
</value></part></template>
